paragraphs.original: 话说贾母次日仍领众人过节。那元妃却自幸大观园回宫去后，便命将那日所有的题咏，命探春钞录妥协，自己编次优劣，又令大观园勒石，为千古风流雅事。因此，贾政命人选拔精工，大观园磨石镌字。贾珍率领贾蓉贾蔷等监工。因贾蔷又管理著文官等十二个女戏子并行头等事，不得空闲，因此又将贾菖、贾菱、贾萍唤来监工。一日烫蜡钉朱，动起手来。这也不在话下。
paragraphs.english:
贾母第二天仍然带领众人过节。元妃自从将那天所有的题咏交给探春抄写，然后自己编次优劣，并且命令大观园勒石，认为这是千古风流雅事。因此，贾政命令人选拔精工，大观园磨石镌字。贾珍率领贾蓉、贾蔷等人监工。因为贾蔷又管理著文官等十二个女戏子并行头等事，不得空闲，因此又将贾菖、贾菱、贾萍唤来监工。一天烫蜡钉朱，动起手来。这也不在话下。

Jia Mo continued to lead everyone in celebrating the festival the next day. Yuan Fei, after handing over all the poetry that day to Princess Tang to copy, then arranged for the poems to be compiled in order of quality and ordered the stones of the Great View Garden to be inscribed. She believed that this was a great literary achievement. Therefore, Jia Zheng ordered skilled workers to prepare the stones for the Great View Garden to be inscribed. Jia Zhen led Jia Rong and Jia Qiang in supervising the construction. As Jia Qiang was also in charge of the twelve female actors and costumes at the Great View Garden, he had no time to spare, so Jia Chang, Jia Ling, and Jia Ping were summoned to supervise the construction. One day, they used wax and paint to engrave the stones, and began to work. This is not worth mentioning.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母第二天仍然带领众人过节。元妃自从将那天所有的题咏交给探春抄写，然后自己编次优劣，并且命令大观园勒石，认为这是千古风流雅事。因此，贾政命令人选拔精工，大观园磨石镌字。贾珍率领贾蓉、贾蔷等人监工。因为贾蔷又管理著文官等十二个女戏子并行头等事，不得空闲，因此又将贾菖、贾菱、贾萍唤来监工。一天烫蜡钉朱，动起手来。这也不在话下。

paragraphs.original: 且说那玉皇庙并达摩庵两处，一班的十二个小沙弥并十二个小道士，如今挪出大观园来，贾政正想发到各庙去分住。不想后街上住的贾芹之母杨氏，正打算到贾政这边谋一个大小事件与儿子管管，也好弄些银钱使用，可巧听见这件事，便坐车来求凤姐。凤姐因见他素日嘴头儿乖滑，便依允了。想了几句话，便回了王夫人，说：“这些小和尚小道士，万不可打发到别处去，一时娘娘出来，就要应承的。倘或散了，若再用时，可又费事。依我的主意：不如将他们都送到家庙铁槛寺去，月间不过派一个人拿几两银子去买柴米就是了。说声用，走去叫一声就来，一点儿不费事。”
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Now, let's talk about the Jade Emperor Temple and the Dharma Pavilion, where a group of twelve little monks and twelve little Taoists are currently staying in the Great View Garden. The Chief Supervisor, Lord Jagged, is thinking of sending them to different temples to live. Unexpectedly, the mother of Jaean, Fong, who lives on the back street, is planning to come to Lord Jagged's side to ask for a small position for her son to manage and earn some money. She heard about this event by chance and came to the wife of the famous woman, Fong, by car. Fong, knowing that she is a clever and slippery person, agreed to her request. After thinking about it, she told the Lady Wang that these little monks and Taoists should not be sent to other places, as they might be needed by the queen later. She suggested sending them to the temple of Iron Gate Mountain, where they could be called upon when needed. This would save a lot of trouble and expense.
paragraphs.chinese: 且说那玉皇庙并达摩庵两处，一班的十二个小沙弥并十二个小道士，如今挪出大观园来，贾政正想发到各庙去分住。不想后街上住的贾芹之母杨氏，正打算到贾政这边谋一个大小事件与儿子管管，也好弄些银钱使用，可巧听见这件事，便坐车来求凤姐。凤姐因见他素日嘴头儿乖滑，便依允了。想了几句话，便回了王夫人，说：“这些小和尚小道士，万不可打发到别处去，一时娘娘出来，就要应承的。倘或散了，若再用时，可又费事。依我的主意：不如将他们都送到家庙铁槛寺去，月间不过派一个人拿几两银子去买柴米就是了。说声用，走去叫一声就来，一点儿不费事。”

paragraphs.original: 王夫人听了，便商之于贾政。贾政听了，笑道：“倒是提醒了我。就是这样。”即时唤贾琏。
paragraphs.english: Mrs. Wang heard this and told it to Jia Zheng. Jia Zheng heard this and laughed, saying, "That reminds me. That's what we'll do." He immediately called Jia Lian.
paragraphs.chinese: 王夫人听了，便告诉了贾政。贾政听了，笑道：“倒是提醒了我。就这样吧。”立刻叫贾琏。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏正同凤姐吃饭，一闻呼唤，放下饭便走。凤姐一把拉住，笑道：“你先站住，听我说话：要是别的事，我不管；要是为小和尚小道士们的事，好歹你依著我这么著。”如此这般，教了一套话。贾琏摇头笑道：“我不管！你有本事你说去。”凤姐听说，把头一梗，把筷子一放，腮上带笑不笑的瞅著贾琏道：“你是真话，还是玩话儿？”贾琏笑道：“西廊下五嫂子的儿子芸儿来求了我两三遭，要件事管管，我应了，叫他等著。好容易出来这件事，你又夺了去。”凤姐儿笑道：“你放心。园子东北角上，娘娘说了，还叫多多的种松柏树；楼底下，还叫种些花草儿。等这件事出来，我包管叫芸儿管这工程就是了。”贾琏道：“这也罢了。”因又悄悄的笑道：“我问你。我昨儿晚上不过要改个样儿，你为什么就那么扭手扭脚的呢？”凤姐听了，把脸飞红，嗤的一笑，向贾琏啐了一口，依旧低下头吃饭。
paragraphs.english: Jialin was having dinner with Fengzheng, and when he heard the errand, he put down his meal and walked away, Fengzheng grabbed him and said, "If it's not something else, and if it's about the little monks and little Taoist priests, you have to do as I say. I said a set of words, and Jialin shook his head and said he wouldn't do it. Fengzheng and Jialin talked about it for a while, and finally Jialin said the northeast corner of the garden, the Empress said, and also called for more pine and cypress trees; the basement, also called for some flowers and plants. Once this matter is done, I promise to let Yunchen manage this project." Fengzheng heard this, blushed, and laughed, spitting at Jialin. She then lowered her head to eat.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏正和凤姐吃饭，一听到差遣就放下饭就走，凤姐一把拽住说：“要是别的事不管，要是为小和尚小道士的事，你一定要按我说的去做。说了一套话，贾琏摇头说不管，凤姐和贾琏说了一番，最后贾琏说园子东北角上，娘娘说了，还叫多多的种松柏树；楼底下，还叫种些花草儿。等这件事出来，我包管叫芸儿管这工程就是了。”凤姐听了，脸红了，嗤嗤地笑着，向贾琏啐了一口，又低下头吃饭。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏笑著一径去了，走到前面，见了贾政，果然是为小和尚的事。贾琏便依著凤姐的话，说道：“看来芹儿倒出息了，这件事竟交给他去管。横竖照里头的规例，每月支领就是了。”贾政原不大理论这些小事，听贾琏如此说，便依允了。贾琏回房，告诉凤姐，凤姐即命人去告诉杨氏。贾芹便来见贾琏夫妻，感谢不尽。凤姐又做情，先支三个月的费用，叫他写了领字，贾琏画了押，登时发了对牌出去。银库上按数发出三个月的供给来－－白花花三百两。贾芹随手拈了一块与掌平的人，“叫他们喝了茶罢。”于是命小厮拿了回家，与母亲商议。登时雇车坐上，又雇了几辆车子，至荣国府角门前，唤出二十四个人来，坐上车子，一径往城外铁槛寺去了。当下无话。
paragraphs.english: Jialin smiled and went, walking to the front and meeting Jiazheng. It was indeed for the little monk's matter. Jialin said as instructed by Fengzheng, "It seems that Erqin has made progress. This matter can be entrusted to him. Let's follow the rules and regulations in the house, and pay monthly." Jiazheng, who didn't care much about these small matters, agreed after hearing Jialin's words. Jialin returned to his room, telling Fengzheng. Fengzheng then instructed someone to inform Yang. Jiaqin then came to see Jialin and Fengzheng, expressing his gratitude. Fengzheng also persuaded him, giving him three months' salary, which he wrote on a piece of paper, and Jialin signed it. Immediately, the staff took out the supplies for three months, 300 silver bars in total. Jiaqin gave a piece to the man who measured it. Then he hired a carriage, as well as several more, and went to the Gate of Ironbend Temple in the city with 24 people. Upon arrival, he asked the temple's master to lead them in. The master then took them to the temple where they immediately went to their respective rooms to rest.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏笑着去了，走到前面，见了贾政，果然是为小和尚的事。贾琏便照着凤姐的话，说：“看来芹儿倒出息了，这件事竟交给他去管。横竖照里头的规例，每月支领就是了。”贾政原不大管这些小事，听贾琏如此说，便依允了。贾琏回房，告诉凤姐，凤姐即命人去告诉杨氏。贾芹便来见贾琏夫妻，感谢不尽。凤姐又做情，先支三个月的费用，叫他写了领字，贾琏画了押，登时发了对牌出去。银库上按数发出三个月的供给来－－白花花三百两。贾芹随手拈了一块与掌平的人，“叫他们喝了茶罢。”于是命小厮拿了回家，与母亲商议。登时雇车坐上，又雇了几辆车子，至荣国府角门前，唤出二十四个人来，坐上车子，一径往城外铁槛寺去了。当下无话。

paragraphs.original: 如今且说那元妃在宫中编次大观园题咏，忽然想起那园中的景致，自从幸过之后，贾政必定敬谨封锁，不叫人进去，岂不辜负此园？况家中现有几个能诗会赋的姊妹们，何不命他们进去居住？也不使佳人落魄，花柳无颜。却又想宝玉自幼在姊妹丛中长大，不比别的兄弟，若不命他进去，又怕冷落了他，恐贾母王夫人心上不喜，须得也命他进去居住方妥。命太监夏忠到荣府下一道谕：命宝钗等在园中居住，不可封锢；命宝玉也随进去读书。
paragraphs.english: Today, the Empress Dowager is compiling the Dai Guan Yuan poetry collection in the palace. Suddenly, she thinks of the scenery of the garden. Since she went there, the Prince of Peace has certainly been careful to seal it off and not allow people to enter. How can we waste such a beautiful garden? Moreover, there are several sisters in the family who are good at poetry and composition. Why not let them live in the garden? This will prevent talented women from falling into ruin and flowers and trees from being without grace. Empress Dowager also thought that since the Prince of Peace grew up among his sisters, he was not like other brothers. If he is not allowed to enter the garden, he may be left behind, and the old lady and Lady Wang may not be happy. He must also be allowed to live in the garden to study. The Empress Dowager commanded eunuch Xia Zhong to go to the Rong府 and issue a decree: order the Princesses to live in the garden, do not seal it off; and order the Prince of Peace to follow suit and study in the garden.
paragraphs.chinese: 今天，元妃在宫中编纂大观园诗集，忽然想起那园子里的风景，自从她去过之后，贾政必定小心封锁，不准人们进去，岂不辜负了这园子？况且家里有几位能诗会赋的姐妹，何不让她们进去居住？也不使佳人落魄，花柳无颜。元妃又想宝玉自幼在姊妹丛中长大，不比别的兄弟，如果不让宝玉进去，又怕冷落了他，恐贾母、王夫人不高兴，必须也命宝玉进去居住方妥。元妃命令太监夏忠到荣府下一道谕旨：命宝钗等在园中居住，不可封锢；命宝玉也随进去读书。

paragraphs.original: 贾政王夫人接了谕命，夏忠去后，便回明贾母，遣人进去各处收拾打扫，安设帘幔床帐。别人听了，还犹自可，惟宝玉喜之不胜。正和贾母盘算，要这个，要那个，忽见丫鬟来说：“老爷叫宝玉。”宝玉呆了半晌，登时扫了兴，脸上转了色，便拉著贾母，扭的扭股儿糖似的，死也不敢去。贾母只得安慰他道：“好宝贝，你只管去。有我呢，他不敢委屈了你。况你做了这篇好文章。想必娘娘叫你进园去住，他吩咐你几句话，不过是怕你在里头淘气。他说什么，你只好生答应著就是了。”一面安慰，一面唤了两个老嬷嬷来，吩咐：“好生带了宝玉去，别叫他老子唬著他。”老嬷嬷答应了。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng and Wang Fei received the imperial decree, Xia Zhong withdrew, and then informed Jia Mother. They instructed everyone to tidy up and clean the place, setting up curtains and bed sheets. Everyone agreed with this, except for the very happy Xiao Yu. While they were talking about what to get and what to do, suddenly a servant girl came to say that the father called Xiao Yu. Xiao Yu was stunned for a moment, then his mood turned sour, his face turned pale, and he held onto Jia Mother and wouldn't let go. Jia Mother comforted him, saying, "Good child, you just go. I'm here, he won't hurt you. Besides, you wrote such a good article, the queen mother must have called you to live in the garden. She will tell you a few words, but don't worry, just listen and do as she says." Jia Mother comforted him and then called two old ladies to take Xiao Yu away, telling them not to scare him. The old ladies agreed.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政王夫人接到圣旨，夏忠退出后，便回禀贾母，指示各处收拾打扫，安设帘幔床帐。众人听了都无异议，只有宝玉十分高兴。正在跟贾母商量要这个要那个，忽然见丫鬟来说：老爷叫宝玉。宝玉愣了一阵，顿时扫了兴，脸上变了色，便拉着贾母，像死鱼一样扭著，不敢去。贾母只得安慰他说：“好宝贝，你只管去。有我呢，他不敢委屈了你。况且你做了这篇好文章，想必娘娘叫你进园子去住，他吩咐你几句话，不过是怕你在里头淘气，他说什么，你只好生答应著就是了。”一面安慰，一面唤了两个老嬷嬷来，吩咐：“好生带了宝玉去，别叫他老子唬著他。”老嬷嬷答应了。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉只得前去，一步挪不了三寸，蹭到这边来。可巧贾政在王夫人房中商议事情，金钏儿、彩云、彩凤、绣鸾、绣凤等众丫鬟都廊檐下站著呢。一见宝玉来，都抿著嘴儿笑他。金钏儿一把拉著宝玉，悄悄的说道：“我这嘴上是才擦的香香甜甜的胭脂，你这会子可吃不吃了？”彩云一把推开金钏儿，笑道：“人家心里发虚，你还怄他！－－趁这会子喜欢，快进去罢。”宝玉只得挨门进去。原来贾政和王夫人都在里间呢。赵姨娘打起帘子来，宝玉挨身而入，只见贾政和王夫人对坐在炕上说话儿。地下一溜椅子，迎春、探春、惜春、贾环四人都坐在那里。一见他进来，探春、惜春和贾环都站起来。
paragraphs.english: Bao Yu had no choice but to go forward, taking each step slowly, until he was near enough. He saw that Jia Zheng and Lady Wang were inside, deep in conversation. He noticed all the maids - Jin Chuan, Cai Yun, Cai Feng, Xiu Luan, and Xiu Feng - standing on the porch. When they saw him, they all smiled. Jin Chuan grabbed his hand and whispered, "I just applied some rouge on my lips. Do you still want to eat it?" Cai Yun pushed Jin Chuan aside and laughed, "You're so nervous! Take advantage of this opportunity and go in." Bao Yu had no choice but to go through each door one by one. Jia Zheng and Lady Wang were sitting on the floor, while Yang Ping, Yan Ping, and Xiao Huan were sitting on the ground. As soon as Bao Yu entered, Yang Ping, Yan Ping, and Xiao Huan all stood up.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉只得向前去，一步一挪，走到近前，贾政和王夫人正在里面商量事情，宝玉看见金钏、彩云、彩凤、绣鸾、绣凤等一干丫鬟们，都站在廊檐下，一见他来，都抿嘴儿笑他，金钏一把拉住宝玉，悄悄地说：“我这嘴上刚擦的胭脂，你这会子可吃不吃了？”彩云一把推开金钏，笑道：“人家心里发虚，你还使他？趁这会子高兴，快进去吧。”宝玉只得挨门进去，贾政和王夫人坐在炕上，迎春、探春、惜春和贾环四人都坐在地下，看见宝玉进来，探春、惜春和贾环都站起来。

paragraphs.original: 贾政一举目见宝玉站在跟前，神彩飘逸，秀色夺人；又看看贾环，人物委琐，举止粗糙；忽又想起贾珠来。再看看王夫人只有这一个亲生的儿子，素爱如珍；自己的胡须将已苍白。因此上，把平日嫌恶宝玉之心不觉减了八九分。半晌，说道：“娘娘吩咐，说你日日在外游嬉，渐次疏懒了工课，如今叫禁管你和姐妹们在园里读书。你可好生用心学习。再不守分安常，你可仔细著！”
paragraphs.english: Ji Zhen saw Yu Bo standing beside him and noticed his ethereal appearance and radiant beauty, while also observing Ju Huan's vulgar appearance and coarse manners. Suddenly, he thought of Ju Zhu, his late son. Seeing that Lady Wang only had this one son and had always loved him like a treasure, Ji Zhen's dislike for Yu Bo diminished by eight or nine parts. After a while, he said, "Your Majesty has instructed that you should study diligently in the garden with the sisters. You must take your studies seriously and not behave recklessly. If you do not, you will be punished."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政一眼看见宝玉站在跟前，神气飘逸，秀色夺人；再看看贾环，人物猥琐，举止粗俗；忽然想起贾珠来。再看看王夫人只有这一个亲生的儿子，素来爱如珍宝；自己的胡须已经花白。因此把平日嫌恶宝玉的心意，不知不觉减了八九分。过了半天，说道：“娘娘吩咐，说你日日在外游玩，渐渐疏忽了功课，如今叫禁管你和姐妹们在园里读书。你可好生用心学习。再不守分安常，你可仔细着！”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉连连答应了几个“是”，王夫人便拉他在身边坐下。他姊弟三人依旧坐下。王夫人摸索著宝玉的脖项，说道：“前儿的丸药都吃完了没有？”宝玉答应道：“还有一丸。”王夫人道：“明儿再取十丸来，天天临睡时候，叫袭人伏侍你吃了再睡。”宝玉道：“从太太吩咐了，袭人天天临睡打发我吃的。”
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Bao Yu nodded repeatedly, "yes", and Wang Fei pulled him to sit by her side. Their brother and sister also sat down. Wang Fei gently stroked Bao Yu's neck and said, "Have you finished all the pills from before?" Bao Yu responded, "I still have one left." Wang Fei said, "Ask for ten more tomorrow, and take one before going to sleep every day." Bao Yu replied, "Yes, since Mrs. Wang has instructed,袭人 will bring one to me before I sleep every day."

paragraphs.original: 二人正计议著，贾政遣人来回贾母，说是二月二十二日是好日子，哥儿姐儿们就搬进去罢。这几日便遣人进去分派收拾。宝钗住了蘅芜院，黛玉住了潇湘馆，迎春住了缀锦楼，探春住了秋掩书斋，惜春住了蓼风轩，李纨住了稻香村，宝玉住了怡红院。每一处添两个老嬷嬷，四个丫头。除各人的奶娘亲随丫头外，另有专管收拾打扫的。至二十二日，一齐进去。登时园内花招绣带，柳拂香风，不似前番那等寂寞了。
paragraphs.english: On February 22nd, Jia Zheng informed Jia Mother that it was a good day and the sisters' quarters would be moved into the Grand View Garden. That day, people were dispatched to divide and organize the garden. Baochai lived in the Lanhua Courtyard, Dazai lived in the Xiaoxiang Pavilion, Yingchun lived in the Zhejin Tower, Tansong lived in the Qianyanshu Zhai, Xici lived in the Liao Feng Xuan, Liwan lived in the Rice Fragrance Village, and Bao Yuyu lived in the Yiyong Courtyard. Each place had two old maids and four maids. In addition to each person's nurse and personal maid, there were also those in charge of cleaning and tidying up. On the 22nd, they all moved in. In a moment, the garden was full of flowers, adorned with embroidery and fluttering in the breeze, and it was no longer as lonely as before.

paragraphs.original: 闲言少叙。且说宝玉自进园来，心满意足，再无别项可生贪求之心。每日只和姊妹丫鬟们一处，或读书，或写字，或弹琴下棋，作画吟诗，以至描鸾刺凤，斗草簪花，低吟悄唱，拆字猜枚，无所不至，倒也十分快意。他曾有几首四时即事诗，虽不算好，却是真情真景。
paragraphs.english: 英文翻译：Let's get to the point. Speaking of how宝玉 has been since he entered the garden, he is very satisfied and no longer has any other desires. Every day, he only spends time with his sisters and maids, reading, writing, playing the pipa, playing chess, drawing, writing poems, embroidery, playing with flowers, singing, guessing riddles, and doing anything he likes. He has written a few poems about the four seasons, although they are not good, they are all true emotions and scenes.

paragraphs.original: 那宝玉不自在，便懒在园内，只想外头鬼混，却痴痴的，又说不出什么滋味来。茗烟见他这样，因想与他开心。左思右想，皆是宝玉玩烦了的，只有一件，不曾见过。想毕，便走到书坊内，把那古今小说并那飞燕、合德、则天、玉环的外传与那传奇角本买了许多，孝敬宝玉。宝玉一看，如得珍宝。茗烟又嘱咐道：“不可拿进园去，叫人知道了，我就‘吃不了兜著走’了！”宝玉那里肯不拿进去？踟蹰再四，单把那文理雅道些的拣了几套进去，放在床顶上，无人时方看；那粗俗过露的都藏于外面书房内。
paragraphs.english: Yù Bǎo felt uncomfortable in the garden and wanted to play with his friends instead. He couldn't express how he felt, but Ming烟 noticed and tried to cheer him up. After thinking for a while, he bought some ancient and modern novels and some plays about emperors and empresses. He gave them to Yù Bǎo as a gift. Yù Bǎo was very happy, but Ming烟 warned him not to bring the books into the garden or he would get into trouble. Yù Bǎo didn't want to leave the books at home, so he hid the fancy ones and left the less fancy ones in the study.

paragraphs.original: 那日正当三月中浣，早饭后，宝玉携了一套《会真记》，走到沁芳闸桥那边桃花底下一块石上坐著，展开《会真记》，从头细看。正看到“落红成阵”，只见一阵风过，树上桃花吹下一大斗来，落得满身、满书、满地，皆是花片。宝玉要抖将下来，恐怕脚步践踏了，只得兜了那花瓣儿，来至池边，抖在池内。那花瓣儿浮在水面，飘飘荡荡，竟流出沁芳闸去了。回来，只见地下还有许多花瓣。
paragraphs.english:
On a certain day, which was the 15th day of the third month, after having breakfast, Bai Yubao carried along with him the "The Meeting in Heaven" and walked to the bridge of Inge Canal under the peach tree. He sat down on a large stone under the tree and opened "The Meeting in Heaven" to read. While he was reading, he came across the phrase "falling petals like a shower". Suddenly, a strong wind blew and petals of peach blossoms fell in a large quantity, covering him, the book and the ground with a layer of peach petals. Bai Yubao wanted to shake off the petals, but he feared that his footsteps would crush them, so he only gathered them up and walked towards the pool. He tossed the petals into the pool, where they floated on the surface, drifting away with the water. When he came back, he found that there were still many petals on the ground.

On a certain day, which was the 15th day of the third month, after having breakfast, Bai Yubao carried along with him the "The Meeting in Heaven" and walked to the bridge of Inge Canal under the peach tree. He sat down on a large stone under the tree and opened "The Meeting in Heaven" to read. While he was reading, he came across the phrase "falling petals like a shower". Suddenly, a strong wind blew and petals of peach blossoms fell in a large quantity, covering him, the book and the ground with a layer of peach petals. Bai Yubao wanted to shake off the petals, but he feared that his footsteps would crush them, so he only gathered them up and walked towards the pool. He tossed the petals into the pool, where they floated on the surface, drifting away with the water. When he came back, he found that there were still many petals on the ground.

In this passage, the author describes the scene where Bai Yubao is reading a book under a peach tree, and suddenly a strong wind blows, causing peach blossoms to fall all around him. He is hesitant to step on the petals because he wants to preserve them, so he gathers them up and tosses them into the pool. When he returns, he finds that there are still many petals on the ground.

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了，喜不自禁，笑道：“待我放下书，帮你来收拾。”黛玉道：“什么书？”宝玉见问，慌的藏了，便说道：“不过是《中庸》《大学》。”黛玉道：“你又在我跟前弄鬼。趁早儿给我瞧瞧，好多著呢。”宝玉道：“妹妹，若论你，我是不怕的，你看了，好歹别告诉人。真是好文章！你要看了，连饭也不想吃呢！”一面说，一面递过去。黛玉把花具放下，接书来瞧。从头看去，越看越爱，不顿饭时，已看了好几出了。但觉词句警人，馀香满口。一面看了，只管出神，心内还默默记诵。宝玉笑道：“妹妹，你说好不好？”黛玉笑著点头儿。宝玉笑道：“我就是个‘多愁多病’的身，你就是那‘倾国倾城’的貌！”

paragraphs.original: 这里黛玉见宝玉去了，听见众姐妹也不在房中，自己闷闷的，正欲回房，刚走到梨香院墙角外，只听见墙内笛韵悠扬，歌声婉转，黛玉便知是那十二个女孩子演习戏文。虽未留心去听，偶然两句吹到耳朵内，明明白白，一字不落，道：“原来是姹紫嫣红开遍，似这般，都付与断井颓垣！”黛玉听了，倒也十分感慨缠绵，便止步侧耳细听。又唱道是：“良辰美景奈何天，赏心乐事谁家院？”听了这两句，不觉点头自叹，心下自思：“原来戏上也有好文章！可惜世人只知看戏，未必能领略其中的趣味。”想毕，又后悔不该胡想，耽误了听曲子。再听时，恰唱到：“只为你如花美眷，似水流年。”黛玉听了这两句，不觉心动神摇。又听道“你在幽闺自怜”等句，越发如醉如痴，站立不住，便一蹲身，坐在一块山子石上，细嚼“如花美眷，似水流年”八个字的滋味。忽又想起前日见古人诗中有“水流花谢两无情”之句；再词中又有“流水落花春去也，天上人间”之句；又兼方才所见《西厢记》中“花落水流红，闲愁万种”之句：都一时想起来，凑聚在一处。仔细忖度，不觉心痛神驰，眼中落泪。正没个开交处，忽觉身背后有人拍了他一下，及至回头看时－－─
